main event: A witness in Winston-Salem, North Carolina observed a UFO for about 30 seconds in September 1968.
interesting points: The witness had seen UFOs at night for the past year.
The UFO was stationary at first and then moved rapidly to the northeast.
The UFO was about the size of a dime held at arm's length and had an elongated shape and grey color.
At one point, the UFO appeared to be spinning and had a type of exhaust coming from it.
The witness and their wife were quite excited about the sighting and wished they could have observed it longer.
sighted object: an elongated, grey UFO that appeared to be spinning and had an exhaust
